name: cldss2

body.origin:
|- wss(cfv(ccld, c0), cpw(c1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)))
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(ccld, c0))
-| diffsc(hs0, cpw(c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (Clsd ` c0)⊆ P(c1)
⊣ (hs0 ∈(Clsd ` c0)→ hs0 ∈ P(c1))
⊣ d(hs0,(Clsd ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, P(c1))

stmt.origin: sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
stmt.pretty: sylibr(hs0 ∈(Clsd ` c0), hs0 ∈ P(c1), hs0 ⊆ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccld, c0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
-| wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (hs0 ∈(Clsd ` c0)→ hs0 ∈ P(c1))
⊣ (hs0 ∈(Clsd ` c0)→ hs0 ⊆ c1)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ P(c1)↔ hs0 ⊆ c1)

body.origin:

-| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
